text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the dawn
Sky is painted gold
Birds singing a song
A new day to unfold

[Verse 2]
Coffee in my cup
Feeling so alive
Got my spirits up
Gonna take a drive

[Chorus]
Sunrise dreams come true
Every day feels new
Chasing skies so blue
With a heart that's true

[Verse 3]
Windows open wide
Feel the morning breeze
Sunlight by my side
Dancing through the trees

[Chorus]
Sunrise dreams come true
Every day feels new
Chasing skies so blue
With a heart that's true

[Bridge]
Leave the past behind
Future's in our sight
Hope is what we'll find
In the morning light
title: Sunrise Dreams
